meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>big</radical> person here, with an extra <radical>drop</radical> of something below their thigh, hanging down. That's <kanji>fat</kanji> right there. This person has fat hanging off their fat.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>fat</kanji> person also has a fat <reading>tie</reading> (たい). It's really thick and luxurious. Imagine them tying their lovely fat tie.
